title: Pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body: So im on Win 8 and this shows up i just re installed league yesterday. does anybody know how to fix this. i tryed running as admin still wont work. help plzzzz.

replies.body:
Hey Firefuze,


Could you verify this issue is still happening after the patch today? We released a fix that should have resolved this issue!
I am still having this same problem.

You are not alone.  There are tons of us on Windows 7 and 8 having this problem.  Some of us have been dealing with it since early December.  None of the so-called "fixes" work and yet Riot remains silent.  If you read enough of the threads you'll find a number of us who have turned in support tickets have yet to receive a response from them.

I am also having this problem. It started a couple days ago and still isn't working. I tried uninstalling/reinstalling, running as administrator, etc. Nothing has worked. It also is saying I have a compatibility issue. Which is weird because I have Windows 8, and it says on their website that League is compatible. I don't know what else to do.
Not working for me either, does Rito know what the issue is?
Still isn't working for me as well.
